fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distract up to 3 players, redirecting them to visit you.
- Crack yourself open, dropping you Defense to Vulnerable, but granting 1 additional shot to all limited abilities of Rocks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time you are attacked, your defense drops by one level.
- If you are nightkilled, your killer will gain 1 shot to all limited night abilities they have.
- If you are lynched, one of the voters at random will gain 1 shot to all limited night abilities they have.
